text: @NYGovCuomo The Coronavirus a very interesting Pandemic it seems, but what if we are dealing with something that had accidentally or incriminated, got out from a secret Laboratory maybe two year’s ago in China, made a scientifically spliced Coronavirus bonded Anthrax Bacteria and now this!!
